priorVersion.title: CDISC ADaM Pool for Integration Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C165644

self.title: CDISC ADaM Pool for Integration Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the name of the Pool, often defined in the integrated statistical analysis plan, which identifies the combination of subjects' clinical trial experience and will be the focus of the integrated analysis.
name: Pool for Integration
preferredTerm: CDISC ADaM Pool for Integration Terminology

terms.definition: The pool that includes data across all studies within which the subject has participated, used for the overall integrated analysis.
